name: Herbal Harmony
description:
Put yourself in the shoes of Professor Truffle, a connoisseur of herbs and fungi alike, as he makes his rounds across the realm as a traveling doctor.

Good health is but a matter of degree of balance of an individual's elements. Do you have the skills needed to balance out every patient's elemental humors?

This game is a submission to SIM JAM.

Features we plan to add down the road:

  1. Story Mode with levels
  2. More herbs (Total of 16 planned)
  3. More ways to combine herbs

Please feel free to share the game, and to leave your thoughts, criticism and questions in the comments. Everything helps!

Follow our developers so that you don't miss it when the next update is out~

Game Design and Programming: Red Salmon
